name: Debevoise & Plimpton
overview:
Debevoise has extensive financing experience in its New York, London, Paris, Frankfurt, Moscow and Hong Kong offices and our Finance practice is as collaborative as it is international. We build teams across practice groups and offices to meet the specific needs of our clients. Members of the Finance group work closely on a daily basis with their colleagues in the tax, workouts and bankruptcy, employee benefits, real estate, communications or intellectual property groups to negotiate, structure and document the transaction components that involve specialized knowledge.

The firmâ€™s distinguished financing clients include issuers, transaction sponsors, investment bankers, underwriters, commercial banks, institutional investors, lessors, lessees and financial advisers whose needs involve acquisition finance, project finance, equipment finance, structured finance and derivatives, syndicated loans, high yield bond offerings, mezzanine finance and private placements.
